meanings.sent1: My friend is a real brainiac when it comes to solving puzzles.
meanings.sent2: The brainiac in our class always gets the highest grades.
meanings.sent3: The brainiac at the library knew every book by heart!
meanings.sent4: She was a brainiac, her mind a library of endless knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The young brainiac amazed everyone with his quick thinking and problem-solving skills.

meanings.definition: A person who is exceptionally skilled or knowledgeable in a particular area.
meanings.sent1: The computer brainiac fixed my laptop in no time.
meanings.sent2: She's a brainiac when it comes to coding and programming.
meanings.sent3: The brainiac chef whipped up a delicious meal in minutes.
meanings.sent4: He was a brainiac in the kitchen, creating culinary masterpieces.
meanings.sent5: The brainiac engineer designed a revolutionary new technology.
